Gojo Satoru mastering hollow purple

Hollow Technique: Purple (虚きょ式しき「茈むらさき」 Kyoshiki・Murasaki?) is the colliding Limitless, an exceptionally powerful secret extension technique only known to a few in the Gojo Clan.

This technique brings the concept of motion and reversal into reality. Purple is born from merging both infinites: Blue and Red, to produce an imaginary mass that rushes forth.

Source: epicstream.com
